## Description
Add support for rich question types beyond multiple choice to create more comprehensive assessments.

## Question Types to Add
- [ ] True/False questions
- [ ] Fill-in-the-blank questions
- [ ] Short answer (text input)
- [ ] Essay questions with manual grading
- [ ] Matching questions
- [ ] Ordering/sequencing questions
- [ ] Code/programming questions with syntax highlighting
- [ ] Mathematical equations (LaTeX support)

## Implementation Details
- Update database schema to support different question types
- Modify JSON test format to include question type field
- Update test-taking UI for different input methods
- Implement auto-grading for applicable types
- Add manual grading interface for essay/short answer
- Update scoring system to handle partial credit

## Priority
High

## Category
Feature - Test Management

## Labels
enhancement, feature, question-types
